## About the Conference

We are thrilled to announce that the **2025 Consortium of European Research on Emotion (CERE) will be held in-person from July 16 to 18 in the beautiful city of Grenoble, France**!

Join us at the main campus of Universit√© Grenoble Alpes for CERE2025, an unparalleled opportunity to **connect with international colleagues, showcase your research, and engage with cutting-edge developments in emotion research**. Explore a diverse array of disciplines, including affective computing, anthropology, art and design, education, history, linguistics, neuroscience, philosophy, psychology, and sociology.

Don't miss this chance to immerse yourself in the vibrant academic community and stunning surroundings of Grenoble. Mark your calendars and prepare for an inspiring conference experience!
